content: skill level beginner i created this pattern with the beginner in mind chunky yarn makes it easy to see the stitches and works up quickly links to picture tutorials are also included making this a great crochet pattern for the beginner that is ready to work in the round this crochet pattern calls for ½ to ¾ of a ball of king cole drifter chunky 100 g 3 ounces /455 meters 170 yards per ball a 6 00 mm j crochet hook a 5 50 mm i crochet hook a fur pom-pom a stitch marker and a yarn needle instructions for 4 different sizes that range from toddler to adult are included this pattern calls for the following stitches and techniques slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet magic_ring working in the round and working in the back loops only
